DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Arco Will Invest $ 1 Billion in Algerian Oil Field : Arco International Oil & Gas Co. , a subsidiary of Los Angeles-based Atlantic Richfield Co. , said it has agreed with Sonatrach , the Algerian state oil_company , to enhance oil recovery at the Rhourde El Baguel oil field , the second-largest field in the country . Arco expects to invest the $ 1 billion over the 25-year life of the project .
